kw.msg: You might have an = symbol in url. You better place 'url=' before, example: 'url=/your-url/foo?param=a' or use '/your-url/foo params=param=a' or escape it

errors.msg: You might have an = symbol in url. You better place 'url=' before, example: 'url=/your-url/foo?param=a' or use '/your-url/foo params=param=a' or escape it
